name: bootstraptemplate
description: [Grayscale](https://startbootstrap.com/theme/grayscale/) is a multipurpose, one page HTML theme for [Bootstrap](https://getbootstrap.com/) created by [Start Bootstrap](https://startbootstrap.com/).

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:pug && npm run build:scss && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:assets

author: Brandon Barker
